description.original: This plugin enables you to increase/decrease the size of an image by scrolling
description.translation: This plugin enables you to increase/decrease the size of an image by scrolling

dict..setDesc('Key that needs to be pressed d: .setDesc('Key that needs to be pressed down for mousewheel zoom to work.')
dict..setDesc('Step value by which the size o: .setDesc('Step value by which the size of the image should be increased/decreased')
dict..setDesc('Initial image size if no size: .setDesc('Initial image size if no size was defined beforehand')
